00102 // double calculateEvaluation(void) method
00103 
00108 
00109 double RootMeanSquaredError::calculateEvaluation(void)
00110 {
00111    // Control sentence (if debug)
00112 
00113    #ifndef NDEBUG 
00114 
00115    if(multilayerPerceptron == NULL)
00116    {
00117       std::cerr << std::endl
00118                 << "Flood Error: RootMeanSquaredError class." << std::endl
00119                 << "double calculateEvaluation(void) method." << std::endl
00120                 << "Pointer to multilayer perceptron object cannot be NULL." << std::endl
00121                 << std::endl;
00122 
00123         exit(1);
00124    }
00125    else if(inputTargetDataSet == NULL)
00126    {
00127       std::cerr << std::endl
00128                 << "Flood Error: RootMeanSquaredError class." << std::endl
00129                 << "double calculateEvaluation(void) method." << std::endl
00130                 << "Pointer to input-target data set object cannot be NULL." << std::endl
00131                 << std::endl;
00132 
00133         exit(1);
00134    }
00135 
00136    #endif
00137 
00138    double rootMeanSquaredError = 0.0;    
00139        
00140    // Multilayer perceptron
00141 
00142    int numberOfInputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfInputs();
00143    int numberOfOutputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfOutputs();
00144 
00145    // Input-target data set
00146 
00147    int numberOfSamples = inputTargetDataSet->getNumberOfSamples();
00148    int numberOfInputVariables = inputTargetDataSet->getNumberOfInputVariables();
00149    int numberOfTargetVariables = inputTargetDataSet->getNumberOfTargetVariables();
00150 
00151    Matrix<double>& inputData = inputTargetDataSet->getInputData();
00152    Matrix<double>& targetData = inputTargetDataSet->getTargetData();
00153 
00154    if(numberOfInputs != numberOfInputVariables || numberOfOutputs != numberOfTargetVariables)
00155    {
00156       std::cout << std::endl
00157                 << "Flood Error RootMeanSquaredError class." << std::endl
00158                                 << "double calculateEvaluation(void) method." << std::endl 
00159                 << "Number of inputs and outputs in multilayer perceptron must be equal to " 
00160                 << std::endl
00161                 << "number of input and output variables in input-target data set." 
00162                 << std::endl << std::endl;
00163 
00164       exit(1);
00165    }
00166 
00167    // Increment number of evaluations
00168 
00169    numberOfEvaluations++;
00170 
00171    double sumSquaredError = 0.0;
00172    double meanSquaredError = 0.0;
00173 
00174    Vector<double> input(numberOfInputs);
00175    Vector<double> output(numberOfOutputs);
00176    Vector<double> target(numberOfOutputs);
00177 
00178    for(int sample = 0; sample < numberOfSamples; sample++)
00179    {
00180       // Input vector
00181 
00182       input = inputData.getRow(sample);
00183 
00184       // Output vector
00185 
00186       output = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutput(input);
00187 
00188       // Target vector
00189 
00190      target = targetData.getRow(sample);
00191 
00192       // Sum squared error
00193 
00194       sumSquaredError += (output - target).dot(output - target);
00195    }
00196 
00197    meanSquaredError = sumSquaredError/(double)numberOfSamples;
00198 
00199    rootMeanSquaredError = sqrt(meanSquaredError);
00200 
00201    return(rootMeanSquaredError);
00202 }

00205 // Vector<double> calculateGradient(void)
00206 
00211 
00212 Vector<double> RootMeanSquaredError::calculateGradient(void)
00213 {
00214    // Multilayer perceptron 
00215 
00216    int numberOfInputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfInputs();
00217 
00218    int numberOfHiddenLayers = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfHiddenLayers();
00219    Vector<int> numbersOfHiddenNeurons = multilayerPerceptron->getNumbersOfHiddenNeurons();
00220 
00221    int numberOfOutputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfOutputs();
00222 
00223    MultilayerPerceptron::PreAndPostProcessingMethod preAndPostProcessingMethod
00224    = multilayerPerceptron->getPreAndPostProcessingMethod();
00225 
00226    Vector<double> meanOfOutputVariables = multilayerPerceptron->getMeanOfOutputVariables();
00227    Vector<double> standardDeviationOfOutputVariables = multilayerPerceptron->getStandardDeviationOfOutputVariables();
00228 
00229    Vector<double> minimumOfOutputVariables = multilayerPerceptron->getMinimumOfOutputVariables();
00230    Vector<double> maximumOfOutputVariables = multilayerPerceptron->getMaximumOfOutputVariables();
00231 
00232    Vector<Perceptron>& outputLayer = multilayerPerceptron->getOutputLayer();
00233    Vector< Vector<Perceptron> >& hiddenLayers = multilayerPerceptron->getHiddenLayers();
00234 
00235    int numberOfNeuralParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfNeuralParameters();
00236    Vector<double> synapticWeights;
00237 
00238    // Input-target data set
00239 
00240    int numberOfSamples = inputTargetDataSet->getNumberOfSamples();
00241    int numberOfTargetVariables = inputTargetDataSet->getNumberOfTargetVariables();
00242 
00243    Matrix<double>& inputData = inputTargetDataSet->getInputData();
00244    Matrix<double>& targetData = inputTargetDataSet->getTargetData();
00245 
00246    Vector<double> target(numberOfTargetVariables);
00247 
00248    // Input, outputs, gradient
00249 
00250    Vector<double> input(numberOfInputs);
00251    Vector<double> inputSignal(numberOfInputs);
00252    Vector< Vector<double> > netInputSignalToHiddenLayer(numberOfHiddenLayers);
00253    Vector< Vector<double> > outputSignalFromHiddenLayer(numberOfHiddenLayers);
00254    Vector< Vector<double> > outputSignalDerivativeFromHiddenLayer(numberOfHiddenLayers);
00255    Vector<double> netInputSignalToOutputLayer(numberOfOutputs);
00256    Vector<double> outputSignal(numberOfOutputs);
00257    Vector<double> output(numberOfOutputs);
00258    Vector<double> gradient(numberOfNeuralParameters, 0.0);
00259 
00260    // Output and hidden errors
00261 
00262    Vector<double> outputError(numberOfOutputs);
00263    Vector< Vector<double> > hiddenError(numberOfHiddenLayers);
00264 
00265    for(int h = 0; h < numberOfHiddenLayers; h++)
00266    {
00267       hiddenError[h].setSize(numbersOfHiddenNeurons[h]);
00268    }
00269 
00270    // Main loop
00271 
00272    double sum;
00273    int index;
00274 
00275    double evaluation = calculateEvaluation();
00276 
00277    for(int sample = 0; sample < numberOfSamples; sample++)
00278    {
00279       // Actual input
00280 
00281       input = inputData.getRow(sample);
00282 
00283       // Preprocess input to obtain input signal to the neural network 
00284 
00285       inputSignal = multilayerPerceptron->preprocessInput(input);
00286 
00287       // Calculate net input output and output signal derivative from all hidden layers
00288 
00289       netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[0] 
00290       = multilayerPerceptron->calculateNetInputSignalToHiddenLayer(0, inputSignal);
00291 
00292       outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[0] 
00293       = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutputSignalFromHiddenLayer(0, netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[0]);
00294 
00295       outputSignalDerivativeFromHiddenLayer[0] 
00296       = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutputSignalDerivativeFromHiddenLayer(0, netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[0]);
00297   
00298       for(int h = 1; h < numberOfHiddenLayers; h++)
00299       {
00300          netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[h] = multilayerPerceptron
00301          ->calculateNetInputSignalToHiddenLayer(h, outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[h-1]);
00302    
00303          outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[h] = multilayerPerceptron
00304          ->calculateOutputSignalFromHiddenLayer(h, netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[h]);
00305 
00306          outputSignalDerivativeFromHiddenLayer[h] = multilayerPerceptron
00307          ->calculateOutputSignalDerivativeFromHiddenLayer(h, netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[h]);         
00308       }
00309 
00310       // Get net input signal to output layer
00311 
00312       netInputSignalToOutputLayer = multilayerPerceptron
00313       ->calculateNetInputSignalToOutputLayer(outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[numberOfHiddenLayers-1]);
00314 
00315       // Get actual output signal from output layer
00316 
00317       Vector<double> outputSignal = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutputSignal(netInputSignalToOutputLayer);
00318 
00319       // Get actual output signal derivative from output layer
00320 
00321       Vector<double> outputSignalDerivative
00322       = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutputSignalDerivative(netInputSignalToOutputLayer);
00323 
00324       // Postprocess output signal from the neural network to get output
00325 
00326       Vector<double> output = multilayerPerceptron->postprocessOutputSignal(outputSignal);
00327 
00328       // Actual target
00329 
00330       Vector<double> target = targetData.getRow(sample);
00331 
00332       // Evaluate the error for all the output units
00333 
00334       switch(preAndPostProcessingMethod)
00335       {
00336          case MultilayerPerceptron::None:
00337          {
00338             outputError = outputSignalDerivative*(output-target)/(evaluation*(double)numberOfSamples);
00339          }// end none
00340 
00341          break;
00342 
00343          case MultilayerPerceptron::MeanAndStandardDeviation:
00344          {
00345             outputError = outputSignalDerivative*((output-target)*standardDeviationOfOutputVariables)
00346             /(evaluation*numberOfSamples);
00347          }// end mean and standard deviation
00348 
00349          break;
00350 
00351          case MultilayerPerceptron::MinimumAndMaximum:
00352          {
00353             outputError = outputSignalDerivative*((output-target)*(maximumOfOutputVariables-minimumOfOutputVariables))
00354             /(2.0*evaluation*numberOfSamples);
00355          }// end minimum and maximum
00356 
00357          break;
00358       }//end switch
00359 
00360       // Backpropagate the output errors to obtain the hidden errors
00361 
00362       // Last hidden layer
00363 
00364       for(int j = 0; j < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[numberOfHiddenLayers-1]; j++)
00365       {
00366          sum = 0.0;
00367 
00368          for(int k = 0; k < numberOfOutputs; k++)
00369          {
00370             synapticWeights = outputLayer[k].getSynapticWeights();
00371             sum += (synapticWeights[j])*outputError[k];
00372          }
00373 
00374          hiddenError[numberOfHiddenLayers-1][j] = outputSignalDerivativeFromHiddenLayer[numberOfHiddenLayers-1][j]*sum;
00375       }
00376 
00377       // Rest of hidden layers
00378 
00379       for(int h = numberOfHiddenLayers-2; h >= 0; h--) 
00380       {   
00381          for(int j = 0; j < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[h]; j++)
00382          {
00383             sum = 0.0;
00384 
00385             for(int k = 0; k < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[h+1]; k++)
00386             {
00387                synapticWeights = hiddenLayers[h+1][k].getSynapticWeights();
00388                sum += (synapticWeights[j])*hiddenError[h+1][k];
00389             }            
00390           
00391             hiddenError[h][j] = outputSignalDerivativeFromHiddenLayer[h][j]*sum;
00392          }
00393       }
00394 
00395       // Calculate gradient elements
00396 
00397       index = 0;
00398 
00399       // Calculate gradient elements of hidden neurons
00400 
00401       // First hidden layer
00402 
00403       for(int j = 0; j < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[0]; j++)
00404       {
00405          // Bias
00406 
00407          gradient[index] += hiddenError[0][j];
00408          index++;
00409 
00410          // Synaptic weights
00411 
00412          synapticWeights = hiddenLayers[0][j].getSynapticWeights();
00413 
00414          for(int k = 0; k < numberOfInputs; k++)
00415          {
00416             gradient[index] += hiddenError[0][j]*inputSignal[k];
00417             index++;   
00418          }
00419       }
00420 
00421       // Rest of hidden layers  
00422     
00423       for(int h = 1; h < numberOfHiddenLayers; h++)
00424       {      
00425          for(int j = 0; j < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[h]; j++)
00426          {
00427             // Bias
00428 
00429             gradient[index] += hiddenError[h][j];
00430             index++;
00431 
00432             // Synaptic weights
00433 
00434             synapticWeights = hiddenLayers[h][j].getSynapticWeights();
00435 
00436             for(int k = 0; k < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[h-1]; k++)
00437             {
00438                gradient[index] += hiddenError[h][j]*outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[h-1][k];
00439                index++;   
00440             }
00441          }
00442       }
00443 
00444       // Calculate gradient elements of output neurons
00445 
00446       for(int j = 0; j < numberOfOutputs; j++)
00447       {
00448          // Bias
00449 
00450          gradient[index] += outputError[j];
00451          index++;
00452 
00453          // Synaptic weights
00454 
00455          for(int k = 0; k < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[numberOfHiddenLayers-1]; k++)
00456          {
00457             gradient[index] += outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[numberOfHiddenLayers-1][k]*outputError[j];
00458             index++;
00459          }
00460       }
00461    }
00462 
00463    return(gradient);
00464 }

00467 // void saveInputTargetAndOutput(char*) method
00468 
00479 
00480 void RootMeanSquaredError::saveInputTargetAndOutput(char* filename)
00481 {
00482    int numberOfOutputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfOutputs();
00483 
00484    int numberOfSamples = inputTargetDataSet->getNumberOfSamples();
00485    int numberOfInputVariables = inputTargetDataSet->getNumberOfInputVariables();
00486    int numberOfTargetVariables = inputTargetDataSet->getNumberOfTargetVariables();
00487 
00488    Matrix<double> inputData = inputTargetDataSet->getInputData();
00489    Matrix<double> targetData = inputTargetDataSet->getTargetData();
00490 
00491    Matrix<double> outputData(numberOfSamples, numberOfOutputs);
00492 
00493    Vector<double> input(numberOfInputVariables);
00494    Vector<double> output(numberOfTargetVariables);
00495 
00496    for(int sample = 0; sample < numberOfSamples; sample++)
00497    {
00498       input = inputData.getRow(sample);
00499 
00500       output = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutput(input);
00501 
00502       outputData.setRow(sample, output);
00503    }
00504 
00505    std::fstream file;
00506 
00507    file.open(filename, std::ios::out);
00508 
00509    // Control sentence
00510 
00511    if(!file.is_open())
00512    {
00513       std::cout << std::endl
00514                 << "Flood Error RootMeanSquaredError class." << std::endl
00515                 << "void saveInputTargetAndOutput(char*) method." << std::endl
00516                 << "Cannot open input-target-output data file." << std::endl
00517                 << std::endl;
00518 
00519       exit(1);
00520    }
00521    else
00522    {
00523       if(display)
00524      {
00525          std::cout << std::endl
00526                    << "Saving input-target-output to data file..."
00527                    << std::endl;
00528       }
00529    }
00530 
00531    // Write file header
00532 
00533    file << "% Flood Neural Network. Input-target-output data file."
00534         << std::endl
00535         << "% 1 - Input data" << std::endl
00536         << "% 2 - Target data" << std::endl
00537         << "% 3 - Output data" << std::endl
00538         << std::endl;
00539 
00540    // Write file data
00541 
00542    for(int sample = 0; sample < numberOfSamples; sample++)
00543    {
00544       // Write sample input data
00545 
00546       for(int i = 0; i < numberOfInputVariables; i++)
00547       {
00548          file << inputData[sample][i] << " ";
00549       }
00550 
00551       // Write sample target data
00552 
00553       for(int i = 0; i < numberOfTargetVariables; i++)
00554       {
00555          file << targetData[sample][i] << " ";
00556       }
00557 
00558       // Write sample output data
00559 
00560       for(int i = 0; i < numberOfOutputs; i++)
00561       {
00562          file << outputData[sample][i] << " ";
00563       }
00564 
00565       file << std::endl;
00566    }
00567 
00568    file << std::endl;
00569 
00570    file.close();
00571 }
